publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5528 Mr Tom McCabe: The Budget (Scotland) Act 2006 Amendment Order 2007—That the Finance Committee recommends that the Budget (Scotland) Act 2006 Amendment Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon*

S2M-5528 Mr Tom McCabe: The Budget (Scotland) Act 2006 Amendment Order 2007—That the Finance Committee recommends that the Budget (Scotland) Act 2006 Amendment Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon
